DOC.brief_summary: The study compare intubate Laryngeal Tube Suction ( iLTS-D ) Ambu®AuraGain™ blind fibreoptic endotracheal intubation . The current randomized study design assess success rate blind fibreoptic endotracheal intubation use i-LTS-D , comparison Air-Q , i-gel® Ambu®AuraGain™ airway simulator . The investigator hypothesize iLTS-D Supreme Laryngeal Mask Airway similarly perform spontaneous ventilation despite difference structural design .
DOC.brief_title: The New Intubating Laryngeal Tube Suction-Disposable
DOC.detailed_description: The intubating Laryngeal Tube Suction-Disposable ( iLTS-D ) ( VBM Medizintechnik , Sulz , Germany ) new update version Laryngeal Tube-Suction Disposable ( LTS-D ) . It ventilator channel 13.5mm internal diameter , enable passage Endotracheal Tube ( ETT ) either blindly fibreoptic guidance . Similarly LTS-D , iLTS-D also separate channel gastric tubes placement size 18 Fr . The current randomized study design assess success rate blind fibreoptic endotracheal intubation use iLTS-D , comparison Ambu® AuraGain™ adult patient general anesthesia .
DOC.criteria: American Society Anesthesiology I II Difficult intubation , cervical pathology
